name: Cooking verse
description: Cooking Verse is a simulation drag and drops game in which the player can simulate the process of cooking various dishes especially snacks virtually. Cooking Verse intended to give users the experience of cooking in a fun, interactive way, and based on real-life situations so the user is given the fundamentals on how to cook and the ingredients needed, to make it easier for them when they want to cook it directly in real life. - This game is a college project game made by HELP University students (Putu Mas Diani Chandra / E1900353 - Renaldhi Fahrezi / E1900355).
